headline: Will Citizens Financial Group (CFG) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
summary: Citizens Financial Group (CFG) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.
